node.title: Homes That Sold for Around $600,000
node.description: Recent residential sales in New York City and the region.
node.content: ["Each week, our survey of recent residential sales in New York City and the surrounding region focuses on homes that sold around a certain price point, allowing you to compare single-family homes, condos and co-ops in different locales.", "The \u201clist price\u201d is the asking price when the property came on the market with the most recent broker. The time on the market is measured from the most recent listing to the closing date of the sale.", "This 91-year-old, 1,714-square-foot house has a living room with a vaulted ceiling and white-brick fireplace, a formal dining room, a kitchen with stainless-steel appliances and a deck on 0.1 acres.", "6 weeks on the market", "$499,000 list price", "24% above list price", "Costs $11,360 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Prominent Properties Sotheby\u2019s International Realty", "A 585-square-foot, postwar co-op, with parquet floors, a galley kitchen that has a breakfast bar, a dining area and a walk-in closet in a doorman elevator building that has an outdoor pool and a no pets policy.", "16 weeks on the market", "$589,000 list price", "2% below list price", "Costs $1,159 a month in maintenance", "Listing broker Warburg Realty", "This 61-year-old, 2,252-square-foot house has a living room with a fireplace, a formal dining room with a chandelier, and a kitchen with a white-tile floor and granite counters on 0.21 acres.", "15 weeks on the market", "$625,000 list price", "6% below list price", "Costs $11,644 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Houlihan Lawrence", "A 95-year-old, 1,388-square-foot, stucco-sided house, with a red-tile roof, a living room that has a fireplace and inlaid hardwood floors, a kitchen that has stainless-steel appliances and a one-car detached garage, on 0.14 acres.", "13 weeks on the market", "$574,990 list price", "4% above list price", "Costs $19,402 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Douglas Elliman", "This 50-year-old, 2,310-square-foot, gambrel-roofed house has beamed ceilings, a living room with a wood-burning stove, a kitchen with black appliances and a bluestone patio, on two acres.", "6 weeks on the market", "$550,000 list price", "18% above list price", "Costs $9,753 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Higgins Group", "A 750-square-foot postwar co-op, with an open floor plan, eastern exposure, a kitchen that has a concrete-topped island, and five closets in a doorman elevator building that does not allow pets.", "30 weeks on the market", "$625,000 list price", "2% below list price", "Costs $1,118 a month in maintenance", "Listing broker Corcoran Group"]
